NOT_FOUND: Sorry! The requested resource could not be found!
GENERAL: Sorry! Something went wrong with the request. Please try again later.
DATA_NOT_CREATED: Some error occurred while creating the document
DATA_NOT_RETRIEVED: Some error occurred while retrieving the document
DATA_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while updating the document
DATA_NOT_DELETED: Some error occurred while deleting the document
NOT_AUTHORIZED: Sorry, you are not authorized to perform this action.
